title: Modern 6-Bedroom Smart House Close to Port–Perfect for Students
description: Welcome to this spacious and energy-efficient 6-bedroom house, ideal for a multi-sharing student group or energetic young professionals. Flooded with natural light from panoramic windows, the stylish living areas flow into a sleek kitchen and a cozy lounge. Additional benefits include a dedicated guest bathroom and a seamlessly integrated smart home system for ultimate convenience. An in-house elevator ensures accessibility to all levels, setting a new standard for comfort in Ustka’s Port District.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Ustka’s trendy Port District, this house is right in the heart of up-and-coming creativity along the Baltic shore. The district is super bike-friendly, dotted with casual cafes, and perfect for long rides along the coast or easy trips via highway to central hotspots. Enjoy a youthful, dynamic neighborhood still catching the local scene vibe, making it perfect for students or groups of young professionals.
target_buyer: Social students or young professionals looking for comfortable, modern shared housing close to natural and urban attractions.
market_positioning: Distinct large-scale house in Ustka, rare for combining energy savings, high-tech amenities, and sharing-friendly layout in a trendy, affordable coastal district.
